trans-unit.source: Displays a dialog for editing multi-line strings in design mode.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MultilineStringEditor"></xref> class.
Edits the specified object value using the edit style provided by <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.GetEditStyle(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext)"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services can be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
The new value of the object.
If the value of the object has not changed, this method should return the same object passed to it.
Gets the editing style of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.ImageEditor.EditValue(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.IServiceProvider,System.Object)"></xref> method.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> enumeration value indicating the supported editing style.
Gets a value indicating whether this editor supports painting a representation of an object's value.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
`false`, indicating that this <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> does not display a visual representation in the Properties Window.
